---

Authenticates the signer. Only API key auth is supported.

## Import

```ts
import { AlchemyServerSigner } from "@account-kit/signer";
```

## Parameters

### params

`Extract<AuthParams, { type: "apiKey" }>`
The parameters for the authentication

## Returns

`Promise<User>`
A promise that resolves to the user
